name: ANGEL GROVE HIGH
effect: Each Ranger in this location has their maximum hand size reduced by 2. Excess cards are immediately discarded.

name: ANGEL GROVE PARK
effect: At the end of each round, move 1 foot soldier from this location to the next location clockwise that is not panicked.

name: BIO LAB
effect: During each battle in this location, the first time a foot soldier card is defeated, do not place it's figure on the experience track.

name: CLOCK TOWER
effect: During each battle in this location, the first time a foot soldier card is defeated, take an extra figure from the supply and place it on the experience track.

name: CYBER DIMENSION
effect: Rangers in this location cannot add [ENERGY] to their personal storage.

name: DOCKYARD
effect: At the start of each battle in this location, drain 1 [ENERGY].

name: ERNIE’S JUICE BAR
effect: When a Ranger in this location performs the RECOVER action, they may recover cards with a total of up to 9 shields (instead of 6).

name: INDUSTRIAL DISTRICT
effect: At the start of each battle in this location, each Ranger may draw 1 card and then place 1 card from their hand back on top of their deck.

name: INTERSTATE HIGHWAY
effect: When a Ranger moves away from this location, they must discard the top card of their deck.

name: K0-35
effect: When any Ranger moves to or from this location, they must discard the top card of their deck.

name: KAT’S LAB
effect: The first time a Ranger resolves a once-per-battle ability during each battle in this location, gain 2 [ENERGY].

name: OCEAN BLUFF RESERVOIR
effect: This location loses its panic token as soon as it contains fewer than 5 foot soldiers and no monsters or bosses.

name: PAI ZHUA ACADEMY
effect: This location gains its panic token as soon as it contains 4 or more enemies.

name: PIGGY’S CAFE
effect: The first time a Ranger resolves a once-per-battle ability during each battle in this location, drain 2 [ENERGY].

name: POWER PLANT
effect: At the start of each battle in this location, gain 1 [ENERGY].

name: REEFSIDE HIGH
effect: The first time a Ranger performs an attack during each battle in this location, remove 1 die from that attack.

name: RESEARCH LAB
effect: At the start and end of every round, each Ranger in this location who has no [ENERGY] in their personal storage may add 1 [ENERGY] to their personal storage.

name: RESISTANCE HIDEOUT
effect: Each time a Ranger in this location uses a Zord ability, that Ranger must discard the top card of their deck.

name: SHOPPING MALL
effect: At the start of each battle in this location, the lead ranger deals 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of their choice.

name: STONE CANYON HIGH
effect: When a Ranger moves away from this location, they may choose 1 card from their discard pile and place it on top of their deck.

name: STONE QUARRY
effect: At the start of each battle in this location, 1 Ranger suffers 2 damage.

name: SURF SPOT
effect: When any Ranger moves to or from this location, they may choose 1 card from their discard pile and place it on the bottom of their deck.

name: THE ARCADE
effect: The first time a Ranger performs an attack during each battle in this location, add 1 die to that attack.

name: ZORD GRAVEYARD
effect: At the start of each Action phase, choose 1 random Zord card from the box and place it at this location. Once per battle, a Ranger in this location may discard 1 Zord card from this location to use its ability.
